question_text: Which of the following are limitations of using a tone generator and probe? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Cannot trace cables in powered state
Does not work on fiber optic cabling
May produce ambiguous results in dense cable bundles
Requires active internet connection to function
correct_answer: Cannot trace cables in powered state
Does not work on fiber optic cabling
May produce ambiguous results in dense cable bundles
explanation: Tone and probe tools work only on copper wiring, require the cable to be unpowered, and may struggle with accuracy in environments with many closely packed cables.
